review: It has done everything it says it does.  Good price.
author: Margaret Mims

review: Love that it is HD- great price for the product!
author: Rob M

review: I really love the Amazon Fire tv stick.
author: Amazon Customer

review: We bought this for our bedroom & absolutely love it! We have a roku in the family room but were looking for a less expensive alternative for the bedroom. We couldn't be more pleased with it.
author: Silent Shopper

review: Awesome!!! Bought it for my daughters room and she doesn't even watch cable anymore
author: Samantha Sakai

review: I have two smart TVs and two regular TVs. The firestick makes the regular TVs world just like smart TVs and you can hardly notice the difference, except that you have to use the fire remote instead of the TV remote, but for the price, it's totally worth it
author: K12087

review: Doesn't work well. Prime content sends error for playing
author: EDUARDO TORRESTORIJA N

review: Cool!  It works just as described. You do have to log into you Netflix etc...
author: Barbara B.
